Congrats – you've made the #LightUpNCF guest list!
We hope you're ready for a taste of the new NCF spirit,
and to join the brightest party of the year. Drinks on us!
Flash this invite and your IC for access to the party.
Venue: Infinite Studios, 21 Media Circle 138562
Date: Friday, 25 Nov 2016
Time: Doors open at 9pm
Dress Code: Lit AF
Name: {{lead.First Name:default=}}
Identification: {{lead.IC_number}}
Remember: no invite and ID, no party!
Follow us on Instagram at @LightUpNCF <[[https://www.instagram.com/lightupncf/]]> for more sneak peek surprises.
Questions? Light up our inbox at support@ncf.sg <[[mailto:support@ncf.sg?Subject=Thank you for your interest in #LightUpNCF]]>
Terms & Conditions: Entry will not be granted to persons not above the legal drinking age of 18 or above. We reserve the rights to request for a valid photo ID to verify recipient’s age. We reserve the right to deny entry if any of the information supplied is inaccurate. We reserve the rights to reject your purchase if you appear intoxicated or are physically or verbally abusive to any of our team members.
Enjoy NCF responsibly
